message.description: The XML message of the transfer.

id.description: The internal ID of the payment transfer.

organizationId.description: The internal ID of the organization.

createdAt.description: The date and time when the payment transfer was created

direction.description: The direction of the payment transfer.

messageId.description: The message ID of the payment transfer. Used to identify the message.

type.description: The payment rail type of the transfer.

initiatingPartyId.description: The initiating party of the payment transfer.

creationDate.description: The date and time when the payment transfer was created

categoryPurposeCode.description: The category purpose code of the payment transfer.

paymentInformationId.description: The information ID of the payment transfer. Used to identify the entire transfer.
